review: It is my first bike and as a person who was upgrading from an Active, this felt just perfect for me...It is a Beginner friendly machine...
name: Daniyel Ramos

review: It's the best naked bike I could think of in this price range but it's expensive based on it's service charge.
name: Joggadi Parua

review: I like the stability and feel. Ride at a high speed of 143 kmph. Brakes are amazing. Safety features are a high. Handle bar grip is good.
name: Villiars Don

review: I got a chance to ride this bike from a friend, firstly the seating position was great, and then engine have a good power.
name: Saybin Brabo

review: Its riding experience is so smooth as butter. It is a proper racing machine. Looks are incredible and performance is also touching
name: Finch Tikka

review: The buying experience was very good. People at bmw really help you to feel comfortable and suggest the way how you can afford bikes.
name: Butler Butta
